des.message: Web page and JSON monitor, get control over information

anon_stats.message: Help us improve Trimgle by sending anonymous statistics

webhook_p1.message: You can send a ping to any web page and automate some information, you can use the following markers :

webhook_p3.message: {%p} if you want to check only a portion of text

webhook_p4.message: So if we are checking a link (or a series of links) we could enter an address of this type :

webhook_p7.message: The ping is sent for each inserted link (one per line) and for each new item checked

no_signature.message: I did not find the markers, normal if you are monitoring a search engine or it could be protected by Cloudflare ( code 503 )

no_update.message: I was unable to update the database

no_results.message: I have markers but not the results

item_not_add.message: Problems, refresh the page and try again !

no_http.message: For the moment we can only check ' HTTP ' addresses we are working to expand the service to other protocols

info_link.message: Move mouse over the link you want to check, only valid links can be monitored

info_text.message: Move mouse over the text you want to check

info_json.message: Move mouse over the item you want to check

mex_not_review.message: There are problems, I recommend you check

no_link.message: The link to this page has problems :

no_exe_link.message: You are already in ' text ' mode, if you want to check the ' link ' refresh the page and rerun the command

no_exe_text.message: You are already in ' link ' mode, if you want to check the ' text ' refresh the page and rerun the command

no_exe.message: Reupdate the page so you can run this command since you had already started a check !

no_context.message: You can't run Trimgle on this page

not_good.message: This page is not suitable for selected Trimgle service

expert_prompt.message:
Type jQuery selector, for example : 
html > div > div > a.myclass

no_selector.message: Have no item with this jQuery selector !
